SEARCH

Class MemberService

java.lang.Object
MemberService
public class MemberService extends Object
Service class that manages library members. Provides functionality to add, find, unregister, pay fines, and persist members to and from files.
Version:
1.0
Author:
hoor

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public void addMember(Member member)
      Adds a new member to the collection.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a member with the same ID already exists

    • findById

      public Member findById(String id)
      Finds a member by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the member ID
      Returns:
      the member object, or null if not found

    • findByName

      public List<Member> findByName(String name)
      Finds members by their name (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - the member name
      Returns:
      list of members with the given name

    • getAllMembers

      public List<Member> getAllMembers()
      Gets all members in the collection.
      Returns:
      list of all members

    • unregisterMember

      public void unregisterMember(String memberId, BookService bookService)
      Unregisters a member from the system. A member cannot be unregistered if they have borrowed books or have unpaid fines.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member to unregister
      bookService - the book service used to check borrowed books
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the member is not found
      IllegalStateException - if the member has borrowed books or unpaid fines

    • payFine

      public void payFine(String memberId, double amount)
      Pays part or all of a member's fine balance. Fine balance will not go below zero.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member paying the fine
      amount - the amount to pay

    • loadMembers

      public void loadMembers(String filename)
      Loads members from a file. Each line should be in the format: memberId,name,contact,fineBalance
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to load from

    • saveMembers

      public void saveMembers(String filename)
      Saves all members to a file. Each line is written in the format: memberId,name,contact,fineBalance
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to save to
